questions.answer: EuroFugees tries its best to screen housing listings to prevent potential scams. If you see or hear something suspicious about a listing on here, contact us immediately.

questions.topic: How can I make sure that a listing is not a scam?
questions.answer: We try our best to make sure all listings on the app are legitimate, but things to look out for just in case are: (a) Landlord refuses to meet in person to discuss things; (b)Landlord does not answers your questions properly or avoids them; (c) Landlord is asking for a sum of money without a tenancy agreement. (d) Landlord refuses to have the tenancy agreement checked by the social services department.

questions.topic: My question isn't on here, how can I contact you all?
questions.answer: If you have a special concern, email us at info@eurofugees.com
